properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , MEM_NICKNAME , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_COUNT FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
